hotelList.name: Newbury Guest House
hotelList.shortDescription: Situated in Boston's Back Bay area, this hotel is 3 blocks from Hynes Convention Center, 4 blocks from Prudential Tower, and 5 blocks from Fenway Park. The Charles River Esplanade is 10 blocks away.

hotelList.name: Seaport Boston Hotel
hotelList.shortDescription: Atop Commonwealth Pier, near the Seaport World Trade Center and the Boston Convention & Exhibit Center, this hotel is one mile from the Financial District, three miles from Logan Airport, and a 10-minute bus ride from South Station.

hotelList.name: Boston Park Plaza
hotelList.shortDescription: Located in historic Back Bay, this hotel just completed a $100 million dollar renovation, and is 3 miles from Logan International Airport and 200 yards from the Boston Common and Public Garden. The hotel is easily accessible to Newbury Street shopping.

hotelList.name: Royal Sonesta Boston
hotelList.shortDescription: Set on the banks of the Charles River, across from the 100 shops of CambridgeSide Galleria, Royal Sonesta Hotel Boston offers sweeping views of the city's skyline.

hotelList.name: Boston Omni Parker House Hotel
hotelList.shortDescription: Located on Freedom Trail in downtown Boston, this hotel is 3 blocks from Quincy Market, 2 from the State House and Boston Common, and adjacent to the Financial District. The hotel is 10 minutes from Logan International Airport by car and 20 minutes by train for only USD 2 each way.

hotelList.name: Porter Square Hotel
hotelList.shortDescription: Situated in Cambridge, this hotel is within 1 mi (2 km) of Somerville Theatre, Harvard Square, and Semitic Museum. Boston University and Harvard University are also within 3 mi (5 km).

hotelList.name: Club Quarters Hotel in Boston
hotelList.shortDescription: Located only 2 blocks from Faneuil Hall and Post Office Square, Club Quarters Hotel in Boston's financial district offers full-service accommodations in a club atmosphere. The hotel is just a short walk away from the Government Center, Quincy Hall, the North End, Boston Commons and Waterfront.

hotelList.name: The Godfrey Hotel Boston
hotelList.shortDescription: Located in Theatre District, this boutique hotel is steps from Boston Opera House and Orpheum Theater. Boston Common and Boston Public Garden are also within 10 minutes.

hotelList.name: Harborside Inn Of Boston
hotelList.shortDescription: Located between the financial district and waterfront across from the lively Faneuil Hall Marketplace, the eight-story granite hotel was built as a warehouse in 1858 and converted to a hotel in 1997.

hotelList.name: Boston Harbor Hotel
hotelList.shortDescription: The 230-room Boston Harbor Hotel is on Rowes Wharf, in the Financial District, and 2 blocks from Faneuil Hall Marketplace and Quincy Market. Boston Logan International Airport is a 10-minute drive away.

hotelList.name: Kimpton Marlowe Hotel
hotelList.shortDescription: This Cambridge hotel overlooks the Charles River and is adjacent to the CambridgeSide Galleria shopping center; Boston is across the river.

hotelList.name: Hotel 140
hotelList.shortDescription: This smoke-free hotel is within 3 blocks of Boston Common, and upscale shopping at Copley Place Mall and Newbury Street.  Short city block from Back Bay Train Station.

hotelList.name: The Colonnade Hotel Back Bay
hotelList.shortDescription: This 285-room Boston hotel is next to Copley Place shopping, 1 block from the Hynes Convention Center, 4 blocks from the Theater District, and 1 mile from Fenway Park.

hotelList.name: Nine Zero Hotel, a Kimpton Hotel
hotelList.localizedName: Nine Zero Hotel, a Kimpton Hotel
hotelList.nonLocalizedName: Nine Zero Hotel, a Kimpton Hotel
hotelList.shortDescription: This trendy hotel is located along Boston's historic Freedom Trail and is 1 block from the Boston Common, the 18th-century King's Chapel, and the Park Street T station.

hotelList.name: Copley Square Hotel
hotelList.shortDescription: Boston's fashionable and historic Back Bay is the setting for this fully renovated boutique hotel on Copley Square. Newbury Street shops are 2 blocks away, and both Boston Common and Fenway Park are within 1 mile. Hynes Convention Center is also nearby.

hotelList.name: The Verb Hotel
hotelList.shortDescription: The Red Sox's Fenway Park is right across the street from this hotel in Boston's Back Bay neighborhood.

hotelList.name: Fairmont Copley Plaza, Boston
hotelList.shortDescription: Located in Boston's historic Back Bay, Fairmont Copley Plaza lies in the heart of the city's entertainment and shopping districts and alongside the Boston Public Library, Trinity Church, and Hancock Tower in Copley Square.

hotelList.name: The Bostonian Boston
hotelList.shortDescription: The lovely Bostonian Boston is located across from historic Faneuil Hall shops and restaurants near the Freedom Trail. Subways and Boston's Financial District are a block away.

hotelList.name: Revere Hotel Boston Common
hotelList.shortDescription: The Revere Hotel is at the edge of the Theatre District, 1 block from the Arlington "T" Station and 2 blocks from Boston Common and the Public Garden.

hotelList.name: Onyx Hotel, a Kimpton Hotel
hotelList.shortDescription: The Onyx is one block from TD Garden and a few short blocks from Faneuil Hall Marketplace and North End; Boston Common is less than a mile away.

hotelList.name: Battery Wharf Hotel, Boston Waterfront
hotelList.shortDescription: This waterfront retreat is surrounded by unique shopping, fine dining, spectacular coastal views, and the rich historical setting of downtown Boston.  It’s also ideally located near Boston’s vibrant North End

hotelList.name: The Langham, Boston
hotelList.shortDescription: The Langham, Boston, in the heart of the financial district, is 5 blocks from Boston Harbor and within 4 miles of Harvard Square.

hotelList.name: Four Seasons Hotel Boston
hotelList.shortDescription: This Boston hotel overlooks the city's Public Garden, across the street. Historic Boston Common is less than a block away. The Massachusetts State House is one-half mile away.

hotelList.name: The Lenox Hotel Boston
hotelList.shortDescription: Opened in 1900, this environmentally-friendly Boston hotel is in the historic Back Bay neighborhood, steps from shopping, museums, and Fenway Park. Newbury Street, the Prudential Center, and Hynes Convention Center are within 3 blocks.

hotelList.name: Chez Pat in Cambridge
hotelList.shortDescription: Situated in Cambridge, this historic bed & breakfast is within 1 mi (2 km) of MIT Museum, Harvard Square, and Semitic Museum. Harvard University and Massachusetts Institute of Technology are also within 1 mi (2 km).
